thread.title: 100 Acres Farm With 20 Acres Licensed Gravel Pit For Sale
thread.title_full: 100 Acres Farm With 20 Acres Licensed Gravel Pit For Sale

title: 100 Acres Farm With 20 Acres Licensed Gravel Pit For Sale
text: 100 acres farm Waterloo area with 20 acres licensed gravel pit Picturesque 100 acres family farm with gravel pit license located in southwestern Ontario, 70 km north of hwy 401 near Listowel north west of Kitchener, on top of a hill with panoramic view of the countryside. Pine and spruce trees were planted west of the house, a natural windbreak. Barn can be used for all kinds of livestock. Fully serviced shop at one end of the driving shed, insulated and heated with propane. Brick house has 2 storeys 4 bedrooms, heated with oil and airtight wood stove. Farm is completely fenced with several cross fences and a pond at the back. Land has a slight roll to it with gravel under the topsoil. Currently, 20 acres is licensed for aggregate extraction, about 70 acres can be licensed. Available are documents pertaining to gravel deposits: pit license class A, site plan, soil testing, water table conditions, estimated capacity of the pit. Licensed for 100k tons of gravel per year - huge income potential. Local contractors expressed interest to buy gravel from this property ... Make an offer ... Property taxes $1,926. Asking price $2,249,000 REDUCED AGAIN... bring all reasonable offers ! Andrew Sobczak On Georgian Bay Real Estate Inc. Real Estate Brokerage RR2, Box 174, Victoria Harbour, ON, L0K 2A0 phone 705 543 1341
